join chain with a slip_stitch to work to begin chain 54 loosely join chain with a slip_stitch to work in the round do not twist the chain in the round do not twist the chain round 1 chain 1 single_crochet in ea chain around join with slip_stitch in round 1 chain 1 single_crochet in ea chain around join with slip_stitch in top of beg st = 42 sts top of beg st = 54 sts round 2 chain 1 single_crochet in ea st around join with slip_stitch in round 2-3 chain 1 single_crochet in ea st around join with slip_stitch in top of beg st = 42 sts top of beg st = 54 sts round 3 chain 1 single_crochet in next st skip 2 sts shell in next round 4 chain 1 single_crochet in next st skip 2 sts shell in next st skip 2 sts 7 times join with slip_stitch in top st skip 2 sts 9 times join with slip_stitch in top of beg st fasten_off = 7 crown spikes of beg st fasten_off = 9 crown spikes with rs of the crown facing you join yarn at the with rs of the crown facing you join yarn at the bottom edge of the crown in beg st of round 1 & bottom edge of the crown in beg st of round 1 & work the edging round work the edging round round 4 edging chain 1 single_crochet in ea st around the edge round 5 edging chain 1 single_crochet in ea st around the edge join with slip_stitch in top of beg st = 42 sts join with slip_stitch in top of beg st = 54 sts finishing fasten_off & weave in all the
